title: BIOS Software Engineer II (201338) NEW!
full_description: Please Note: This will be a remote position at this time.Job Description:This position is mostly Firmware development in C for SSDs. In this position, your responsibilities will include, but may not be limited to:Designing, developing/coding, and debugging SSD FirmwareReviewing and providing strong feedback on firmware and software architecture specifications and design specificationsDebugging software and system issuesResponding to customer and/or client requests or events as they occurDeveloping solutions to problems utilizing formal education, judgment, and formal software processDemonstrate strong problem-solving skills and communication skillsWork well in a team environment.Minimum Education:Must have a Bachelor or Master of Science Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or Software Engineering Minimum Qualifications:Must have the unrestricted right to work in the US without sponsorship at the BS Ievel onlyAt the Masters Ievel, a minimum of 3 years’ experience with C/C++ and object-oriented coding skillsAt the Bachelors Ievel, a minimum of 4 years’ experience with C/C++ and object-oriented coding skillsMinimum 3 years’ experience with SSD and/or HDD system-Ievel architecturesMinimum 3 years’ experience in storage product developmentMinimum 2 years’ experience with embedded systems and related HW skills: SSD/HDD, NAND, SAS/SATA/PCIE, RTOS
